ModMetaData.name: Equipment Deterioration
ModMetaData.author: LimeTreeSnake
ModMetaData.description:
1.1 (2018-11-19)
Vanilla Rimworld arbitrarily checks each day, each piece of apparel on each pawn, whether it should have it deteriorate by one point. However, this is not done for weapons and other equipment. This mod rectifies that by doing the same check for them.
An added bonus to that is that weapons used now deteriorates as well. Whenever a gun is fired or whenever a melee weapon hits something, a check for deterioration is made.
These percentage values can be changed in the mod settings.
-Special Thanks to- Jecrell: cause he is great and his code helped me a lot. Pardeike: cause of his work on Harmony.
-Links- https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=46890.msg445480 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1565674984
Updates: 2018-11-19 - Added functionality for deterioration of weapons upon use. 2018-11-16 - Made the deteriorate value changeable through mod settings.
-License- You may use this code as it pleases you but for now, do notify me as I'd love to hear if people find use of this! :)
